about_the_game:
DREAMERS Original Soundtrack features nearly two hours of orchestral and ambient music, created by an international team: composed by Svetlana Khanina and Irina Slepchenko, and orchestrated by Markus Elgland.

With its 31 instrumental tracks, the soundtrack of DREAMERS promises to transport players in a relaxed and exciting atmosphere, to immerse after a tiring day, and to travel with the protagonists of the game between different worlds and realities.

Each track has been created to represent best every environment, mood or place in the game: from the cheerful and fun sounds of the tavern (Track 13 - A Tavern in the Port) to the darker and stirring themes of the mysterious region(Track 14 - A Path Beyond), up to those relaxed and cozy on the island or in the city (Track 04 - Careless Lifestyle, Track 02 - Afternoon in the City).
